name: Apollo (karthik006)
description:
Apollo is an endless 2D platformer with unique mechanics.

The aim is to switch between colors to see different objects and obstacles and get a high score.

Colors and their functionalities:
Yellow – Can see coins
Red – Can see traps
Blue – Can double jump

Move with a, d and jump with space. Use 1, 2, 3 to switch between colors.
